meanings.def: a dry mass of very small fine pieces or grains
examples: lumps of chalk crushed to a fine white powder
a wide range of cleaning fluids and powders
The mustard is sold in powder form.
powder skiing (= on fine dry snow)
Before the photo dries, the image is dusted with a special powder.
The seeds are ground into a fine powder before use.

meanings.def: a very fine, soft, dry substance that you can put on your face to make it look smooth and dry
examples: I only use lipstick and a little powder.
She quickly dabbed some powder on her cheeks.

meanings.def: explosive powder used especially in bombs or fireworks
to remain ready for a possible emergency
to leave suddenly; to run away

idioms.def: to remain ready for a possible emergency
to leave suddenly; to run away

examples: She powdered her face and put on her lipstick.

meanings.def: a polite way of referring to the fact that a woman is going to the toilet
examples: I'm just going to powder my nose.

idioms.def: a polite way of referring to the fact that a woman is going to the toilet
examples: I'm just going to powder my nose.
